name: Notion
description: Notion is a collaboration and productivity tool.

name: Atlassian
description: Collaboration software for software, IT and business teams.

name: Sentry
description: Sentry is a developer-first error tracking and performance monitoring platform.

name: Neon
description: Neon is a fully managed serverless PostgreSQL.

name: Fireflies
description: Fireflies is an AI meeting assistant

name: Otter
description: Otter.ai is an AI-powered assistant that generates rich notes from meetings.

name: PagerDuty
description: PagerDuty is an incident management platform.

name: Github
description: GitHub is a code hosting platform for version control and collaboration.

name: Linear
description: Linear is a streamlined project and issue tracking tool for software teams.

name: Hugging Face
description: Hugging Face is a platform for machine learning models, datasets, and AI tools.

name: Honeycomb
description: Honeycomb is an observability platform for understanding production systems.

name: Paypal
description: PayPal is a global online payment platform letting users securely send/receive money, shop, and manage finances.

name: Box
description: Box is a cloud content management platform letting users securely store, share, and collaborate on files and documents.

name: Asana
description: Asana is a cloud-based work management platform that helps teams organize, track, and manage their projects and daily tasks in one place, allowing for better collaboration, clarity on responsibilities (who's doing what by when), and streamlined workflows through features like task lists, boards, timelines, and automation.

name: Pendo
description: Pendo is a product analytics and user guidance platform letting product teams understand user behavior, guide users through features, and gather feedback to improve product adoption and user experience.
